pages.text: There are a number of resources a sensible mage will have on hand. Some can be simply collected, while obtaining others may require $(l:crafting/introduction)tools$() (that can be crafted), specific $(l:rituals/introduction)rituals$() or $(l:spells/introduction)spells$().$(br2)Some resources themselves are crafted, either through traditional means, or using specially purposed devices, or gathered from entities with special tools.

For example, obtaining $(l:resources/bark)bark$() requires that you have crafted a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$(), likewise $(l:resources/petals)petals$() need a $(l:crafting/mortar_and_pestle)mortar & pestle$().$(br2)More complex resources will require more complex crafting systems, such as $(l:resources/runestone)runestone$() requiring a $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), or $(l:resources/mystic_feather)mystic feathers$() and $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$() requiring $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$().$(br2)$(info) Regardless of its source, every $(cat:resource)resource entry$() will list precisely how it is obtained and link to that method.
